xml

Class MapParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml.MapParser

  • public class MapParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements XML write and parse functions. This class will use for saving a customized map into a XML file and transform XML file for reloading an existing map on the map editor panel
    Author:
    Hongrui Guan

    • Method Detail

      • createXMLFile

        public boolean createXMLFile(Tile[][] map_information,
                    java.lang.String map_name)
        This method saves a map information to a XML file.
        Parameters:
        map_information - All tiles information in the map.
        map_name - The map name that user named for
        Returns:
        Return true if XML file creating succeed

      • loadXMLFile

        public boolean loadXMLFile(java.lang.String map_directory)
        This method loads XML file and gets the root element of XML file. This method should be invoked before methods getMapName and getMapData. The root element will be saved as a property of class.
        Parameters:
        map_directory -
        Returns:
        Return true if loading xml file successfully

      • getMapName

        public java.lang.String getMapName()
        This method acquires map name from the root element of XML file.
        Returns:
        mapName The map name will be returned as a string.

      • getMapData

        public Tile[][] getMapData()
        This method acquires map data from the root element of XML file.
        Returns:
        tiles All tiles will be returned as a Tile array.

      • checkFileName

        public boolean checkFileName(java.lang.String file_name)
        This method check if created XML file has exists in the user directory. This method will be invoked on method createXMLFile.
        Parameters:
        file_name -
        Returns:
        Return false if XML file does not exist on the directory.
